channel.title: [PI]ZioBotic Pkz v2[PI] Custom Dungeoneering!
channel.description:
Welcome, I Am ZioBotic or Zio in game. Where to get started???
THIS VERSION IS OUTDATED CLICK FOR NEW VERSION:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=514268.0 Features: -Custom Dungeoneering minigame -Working Ring Of Kinship -508 Map Data -634 Items -Lots of shops -602 Npc's -Dungeoneering Teleport Added -And much more
To Be Added -Better Running System and Plugins -More Shops -Scripted Quest's -Not Much More
Maybe Being Added -Torva + More Item's -Dungeoneering Skill ~ Not just Minigame -Cba To Write More for this.. -New Hit System.
Bonus Details: Okay, I have changed the npc drops, attack styles of the dungeoneering npc's and they all have 2 100% drops (ON PI) It took time to figure out but it drops bones and money :3... There are 602 gfx's plus I fixed the bug where you clicked an object signed and uninsigned to actionhandler it tells you coords and object ID =, it no longer does this . Networking is fixed and I use my friends plugins. Ring of kinship teleports you by clicking teleport to daemonheim
Something You May Need To Know Okay, For the saddist's that will or might claim that I am not legitimate, get some friends, I do not have a virus scan image as i feel that this is a trusted forum If you Moan at Me because I capitalise everything grow up, I must say it looks neater..
Credits: Me K4rn4ge Kaex - Base Kev - Ideas
Media: [img]http://i1104.photobucket.com/albums/h321/Skyline3000/NewEmoteSprites.png[/img] [img]http://i1104.photobucket.com/albums/h321/Skyline3000/HomeShopspc.png[/img] [img]http://i1104.photobucket.com/albums/h321/Skyline3000/YouCannotteleportAboveLevel20-wilderness.png[/img] [img]http://i1104.photobucket.com/albums/h321/Skyline3000/Godwars.png[/img] [img]http://i1104.photobucket.com/albums/h321/Skyline3000/Cockroachtraining.png[/img] [img]http://i1104.photobucket.com/albums/h321/Skyline3000/508MapData.png[/img] Click For Dungeoneering teleport Click For Ring Of Kinship Teleport Floor 1 [img]http://i1104.photobucket.com/albums/h321/Skyline3000/Dungeoneeringflooroneshop.png[/img] Floor 2 [img]http://i1104.photobucket.com/albums/h321/Skyline3000/Dungeoneeringfloortwoshop.png[/img] Floor 3 shops* [img]http://i1104.photobucket.com/albums/h321/Skyline3000/Dungeoneeringfloorthreeshop.png[/img] [img]http://i1104.photobucket.com/albums/h321/Skyline3000/Dungeoneeringfloorthreebonusshop.png[/img] Download Link is A Package Will add more detail Tommorow I'm tired... [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?3inbn6as210azrz]Download[/url] Thanks For Reading, Ziobotic Custom Sprite I Am Working On (Slightly Watermarked): [img]http://i1104.photobucket.com/albums/h321/Skyline3000/Hits0.png[/img]
Okay, Im Partly On V2.5, Ive Improved Dungeoneering Massivley, Not just dungeons, but daemonheim too, im wondering wether to upload ideas? comment...

item.title: [PI]ZioBotic Pkz v2[PI] Custom Dungeoneering!
item.dc:creator: @master_laake master laake
item.description:
@master_laake wrote:

[quote=“rifblood10, post:16, topic:408560”]i will give credits if you release a webclient with it ,
mine stucks at unpacking config.
sorry an error has accured…[/quote]
You have to make an executable jar file, then you have to upload it onto a website like dropbox. if you have done this and you still get an issue with making webclient then check the client to see if it downloads the cache, if it doesnt add your cache to drop box or somethign that auto downloads without having to wait or click a button. then make sure it looks for the cache in the C:drive! if theres any other issues i can help for free!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @adamsmall2021 adamsmall2021
item.description:
@adamsmall2021 wrote:

This is very nice one problem with it the commands need more like ::master wasnt added :mad:

but for those who want the code for master on this go into commands and edit it there put

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”)) {
for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) {
c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
}
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
}

In the list of them
